thread.title: CommerceWest Bank and Jamboree Housing Teamed Up to Help Create More Opportunities for Lower-Income Families
thread.title_full: CommerceWest Bank and Jamboree Housing Teamed Up to Help Create More Opportunities for Lower-Income Families - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: CommerceWest Bank and Jamboree Housing Teamed Up to Help Create More Opportunities for Lower-Income Families
text:
CommerceWest Bank
IRVINE, Calif. , Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- CommerceWest Bank (OTCBB:CWBK) and Jamboree Housing teamed up to help create more opportunities for lower-income families to access affordable housing. The Jamboree Housing 25 th Anniversary event helped raise funds that will transform the lives of families, seniors, veterans, formerly homeless, and those with special needs.
"Our team wanted to make a difference and help improve our communities for those that are less fortunate," stated Ivo A. Tjan , Chairman and CEO of CommerceWest Bank. He continued, "Jamboree Housing does not just put a roof over the head of the families they serve. They provide an affordable and safe place called home, where memories can be made."
CommerceWest Bank is a California -based commercial bank with a unique vision and culture of focusing exclusively on the small to mid-size business community. Founded in 2001 and headquartered at 2111 Business Center Drive in Irvine, CA. The Bank serves businesses throughout California with an emphasis on clients in Orange , San Diego , Los Angeles and Riverside Counties. We are a full service business bank and offer a wide range of commercial banking services, including concierge services, remote deposit solution , online banking , lines of credit , working capital loans , commercial real estate lending , SBA lending , and cash and treasury management services .
Mission Statement: CommerceWest Bank will create a complete banking experience for each client, catering to businesses and their specific banking needs while accommodating our clients and providing them high-quality, low stress and personally tailored banking and financial services.
Please visit www.cwbk.com to learn more about the Bank. "BANK ON THE DIFFERENCE".
